patterns.title: Composite indexes for FK joins
patterns.problem: Sequential scans on FK columns causing slow queries
patterns.solution: Create composite index (fk_col, parent_id) for frequently joined foreign keys
patterns.when_to_apply: When EXPLAIN ANALYZE shows sequential scan on FK joins

patterns.title: Server/Client component split in Next.js
patterns.problem: Unnecessary client-side hydration and bundle bloat
patterns.solution: Keep parent as Server Component, only mark interactive children with 'use client'
patterns.when_to_apply: When component doesn't need interactivity but contains interactive children

patterns.title: Type hints in Python/TypeScript
patterns.problem: Missing type information leading to runtime errors
patterns.solution: Add explicit type annotations to all function parameters and return values
patterns.when_to_apply: Whenever creating new functions or when linter reports missing types

patterns.title: Lazy loading database connections for Next.js builds
patterns.problem: Next.js build tries to execute server code, failing when DATABASE_URL has placeholders
patterns.solution: Use Proxy pattern or lazy initialization to defer connection until runtime. Return empty arrays in server actions when DB not configured.
patterns.when_to_apply: When using database in Next.js with static generation and environment variables

patterns.title: Tailwind version compatibility with Next.js
patterns.problem: Tailwind v4 has breaking changes in PostCSS config, incompatible with Next.js 14
patterns.solution: Use Tailwind v3 for Next.js 14 projects. Tailwind v4 requires @tailwindcss/postcss package.
patterns.when_to_apply: When setting up new Next.js 14 project with Tailwind
